title: RuneScape: Theatre of Blood

properties.name: description
properties.value: RuneScape: Theatre of Blood is a digital soundtrack for the Theatre of Blood.

content:
RuneScape: Theatre of Blood
Release date 21 May 2020
Artists Ian Taylor, Julian Surma
Format(s) Digital (Downloadable, Streaming)
Label Laced Records
Genre Instrumental
Retail price GBP: £7.99[1]
USD: $8.99[2]
EUR: €9.99[3]
Streaming platforms
    

RuneScape: Theatre of Blood is a digital soundtrack for the Theatre of Blood.

Contents

  • 1 Tracklist
  • 2 Credits
  • 3 Trivia
  • 4 References

Tracklist[edit | edit source]

# Title Time
1 Welcome to the Theatre 5:01
2 The Maiden's Sorrow 8:56
3 The Maiden's Anger 6:52
4 Welcome to my Nightmare 7:34
5 The Nightmare Continues 7:30
6 Dance of the Nylocas 5:55
7 Arachnids of Vampyrium 6:54
8 The Dark Beast Sotetseg 6:01
9 Power of the Shadow Realm 7:32
10 Predator Xarpus 4:56
11 Last King of the Yarasa 7:03
12 It's not over 'til... 4:18
13 The Fat Lady Sings 6:52
14 The Curtain Closes 7:09
15 Verzik's Defeat 0:07

Credits[edit | edit source]

  • Music by - Ian Taylor (2-5, 12-15), Julian Surma (1, 6-11)
  • Producer - Stephen Lord
  • Artwork by - Jagex Ltd
  • Copyright © - Jagex Ltd
  • Licensed to - Laced Music Ltd

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Track 15, Verzik's Defeat is an unlisted track that is played at the end of each boss fight within the Theatre of Blood.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Amazon (UK). (Archived from the original on 5 June 2020.) “£7.99”*
  2. ↑ Amazon (US). (Archived from the original on 5 June 2020.) “$8.99”*
  3. ↑ Amazon (France). (Archived from the original on 5 June 2020.) “€9.99”*

'''USD''': $8.99{{CiteGeneral|url=https://www.amazon.com/RuneScape-Ian-Taylor-Julian-Surma/dp/B088KCDX4P/|title=Amazon (US)|quote=$8.99|accessdate=06:03, 5 June 2020 (UTC)|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/tIidL|archivedate=5 June 2020}}
'''EUR''': €9.99{{CiteGeneral|url=https://www.amazon.co.uk/RuneScape-Julian-Surma-Ashton-Taylor/dp/B086Q1VQ68/|title=Amazon (France)|quote=€9.99|accessdate=06:03, 5 June 2020 (UTC)|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/QdDA2|archivedate=5 June 2020}} |spotify=0IAetM6xaCe5St97UgAoFB |itunes=1513116800 |deezer=148074132 }} '''''RuneScape: Theatre of Blood''''' is a digital soundtrack for the [[Theatre of Blood]]. ==Tracklist== {| class="wikitable align-center-3" |- !# !Title !Time |- |1 |[[Welcome to the Theatre]] |5:01 |- |2 |[[The Maiden's Sorrow]] |8:56 |- |3 |[[The Maiden's Anger]] |6:52 |- |4 |[[Welcome to my Nightmare]] |7:34 |- |5 |[[The Nightmare Continues]] |7:30 |- |6 |[[Dance of the Nylocas]] |5:55 |- |7 |[[Arachnids of Vampyrium]] |6:54 |- |8 |[[The Dark Beast Sotetseg]] |6:01 |- |9 |[[Power of the Shadow Realm]] |7:32 |- |10 |[[Predator Xarpus]] |4:56 |- |11 |[[Last King of the Yarasa]] |7:03 |- |12 |[[It's not over 'til...]] |4:18 |- |13 |[[The Fat Lady Sings]] |6:52 |- |14 |[[The Curtain Closes]] |7:09 |- |15 |[[:File:Theatre of Blood - wave complete.ogg|Verzik's Defeat]] |0:07 |} ==Credits== *Music by - {{RSL|Mod Ian|Ian Taylor}} (2-5, 12-15), {{RSL|Mod Surma|Julian Surma}} (1, 6-11) *Producer - {{RSL|Mod Lord|Stephen Lord}} *Artwork by - [[Jagex|Jagex Ltd]] *Copyright © - Jagex Ltd *Licensed to - [https://www.lacedrecords.co Laced Music Ltd] ==Trivia== *Track 15, Verzik's Defeat is an [[unlisted music tracks|unlisted track]] that is played at the end of each boss fight within the [[Theatre of Blood]]. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Theatre of Blood}} {{Music}} {{Restricted title|Subject begins with "RuneScape:", which would place it in the wrong namespace; displaytitle used instead}} [[Category:Official merchandise]]
